title: With IPO, Alibaba Hopes To Compete In The West
teaser: Shares of Chinese Internet giant Alibaba started trading on the New York Stock Exchange on Friday. The company raised more than $20 billion with its initial public offering, shattering a U.S. record set by Visa in 2008.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
